quote: Don't confuse genuine peace of mind with the passing lack of angst that follows the demise of a dream but precedes a mounting wave of regret.
author: NULL

quote: Only people who don't work make no mistakes.
author: NULL

quote: Music gives a soul to the universe, wings to the mind, flight to the imagination, and life to everything.
author: Plato

quote: Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter and those who matter don't mind.
author: Dr. Seuss
